description: Scientists at Peking University have developed a stretchable elastomer that converts body heat into electricity, detailed in Nature. The breakthrough uses thermoelectricity to power wearable and implantable devices without batteries. Enhanced with a doping agent for higher conductivity, the material combines flexibility with efficiency, marking a leap for self-powered electronics and medical technologies.
title: Scientists Create Stretchy Rubber That Converts Body Heat Into Electricity for Wearables

description: Lokah Chapter 1: Chandra is set to stream on Netflix from 26 September 2025 after a successful theatrical run. Directed by Dominic Arun and led by Kalyani Priyadarshan, the film blends mythology and action, earning strong reviews and box office success while starting a new Malayalam superhero universe.
title: Kalyani Priyadarshan’s Lokah Chapter 1: Chandra OTT Release Date Revealed

description: Scientists using NASA’s InSight lander data have uncovered dozens of dense blobs hidden in Mars’ mantle, possibly remnants of failed protoplanets from the early solar system. Preserved for billions of years, these structures reveal Mars’ mantle evolved sluggishly compared with Earth, offering a unique window into planetary formation and the violent impacts that shaped the Red Planet.
title: NASA’s InSight Reveals Ancient Planetary Remains Preserved Deep Inside Mars

description: NASA’s Juno spacecraft has captured Callisto’s elusive auroral footprint, completing the “family portrait” of Jupiter’s Galilean moons. Each moon carves its own aurora into the gas giant’s poles, revealing how they interact with Jupiter’s powerful magnetosphere. Callisto’s faint arc appeared during a 2019 flyby, finally confirming its mark.
title: NASA’s Juno Spacecraft Detects Callisto’s Aurora, Completing Jupiter’s Galilean Moons Set

description: Coolie, the Tamil action thriller starring Rajinikanth and directed by Lokesh Kanagaraj, is set to stream on OTT platforms soon. The film will arrive on Amazon Prime Video on September 11. It has a stellar star cast, featuring actors like Nagarjuna, Shruti Haasan, Upendra Rao, and more. Here is all you need to know.
title: Rajinikanth’s Coolie is Coming to OTT Platforms Soon: Know When, Where to Watch it Online

description: Directed by Mohit Suri, Saiyaara is set to make its debut on OTT platforms soon. The film is a Hindi-languageromance drama that features debutants Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda in the lead roles. Here is all you need to know about the Saiyaara OTT release date.
title: Saiyaara to Stream on Netflix Soon: All the Details About This Ahaan Panday, Aneet Padda Starrer

description: Wake Up Dead Man is an American Mystery Thriller movie that follows Benoit Blanc’s return to solve a murder mystery. It is a sequel to Glass Onion (2022). Written and directed by Rian Johnson, this movie stars Daniel Craig in the lead role. It is a perfect blend of crime, thrill, comedy, and a top-notch investigation. Here is all you need to know about its OTT release.
title: Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery Release Date is Out: When, Where to Watch It Online?

description: Apple’s ‘Awe Dropping’ event is scheduled to take place on September 9. During the event, the Cupertino company is set to launch its latest smartphone lineup. Along with the phones, the tech giant could also unveil three new smartwatches, dubbed the Watch Series 11, Watch SE 3, and Watch Ultra 3. Although the Watch Series 11 might not come with significant upgrades over its predecessor, it could borrow a new feature from the Watch Ultra series.
title: Apple Watch Series 11, Watch SE 3 and Watch Ultra 3: Features, Upgrades to Look Forward To

description: Astronomers have discovered Calvera, a pulsar speeding 6,500 light-years above the Milky Way’s disk. Formed from a supernova in a nearly empty region, Calvera challenges long-held ideas of star birth and death. Its discovery reveals that extreme stellar events can occur even in the galaxy’s sparse outer halo.
title: Astronomers Discover Calvera, a Runaway Pulsar Racing Above the Milky Way

description: From smarter sleep and training tools to AI-powered voice assistance and groundbreaking nutrition insights, here’s how Samsung’s latest wearables are shifting the conversation from “fitness” to “longevity.”
title: Galaxy Watch8 Series and the Future of Preventive Wellness: How Antioxidant Tracking and AI Are Transforming Ageing and Everyday Health

description: The Itel A90 Limited Edition has been launched in India, priced at Rs. 6,399 and Rs. 6,899 for the 3GB+64GB and 4GB+64GB variants, respectively. It features a 6.6-inch 90Hz HD+ IPS LCD screen, Unisoc T7100 chipset, MIL-STD-810H durability, IP54 rating, and Aivana 2.0 AI assistant. The handset supports DTS-backed audio, a 5,000mAh battery with 15W charging, a side-mounted fingerprint sensor, a 13-megapixel main rear sensor and an 8-megapixel selfie shooter.
title: Itel A90 Limited Edition Launched in India With MIL-STD-810H Durability: Price, Specifications

description: NASA’s OSIRIS-REx mission has found presolar stardust grains inside Bennu’s samples. These tiny particles, older than the Sun, carry chemical fingerprints of ancient stars and interstellar space. Bennu thus serves as a pristine time capsule, preserving the earliest clues to the birth of our solar system.
title: NASA’s OSIRIS-REx Mission Finds Stardust in Asteroid Bennu Older Than the Solar System

description: The Dutch National Bank fined OKX EUR 2.25 million (roughly Rs. 21.9 crore) for operating without proper registration between 2023 and 2024. The penalty comes under the country’s AML rules, which apply to all crypto firms regardless of size. OKX joins exchanges like Crypto.com and Kraken in facing sanctions. With MiCA now in full effect across the EU, regulators are tightening enforcement, signalling that compliance is non-negotiable for global exchanges aiming to operate in Europe.
title: OKX Faces EUR 2.25 Million Fine By Dutch National Bank for Operating Without Registration

description: With Gemini integrated natively into the Galaxy Watch8 Series, AI becomes not just accessible — but actionable, directly from your wrist.
title: World First: Why Google Gemini on the Samsung Galaxy Watch8 Series Is a Big Deal

description: Acer launched the Swift Air 16 and Chromebook Plus Spin 514 at IFA 2025, along with two new Chromebox models. The Swift Air 16 runs on AMD Ryzen AI 300 series processors with Radeon graphics, offers up to 13 hours of battery life, weighs under 1 kg, and features AMOLED or IPS display options. The Chromebook Plus Spin 514 is powered by the MediaTek Kompanio Ultra chip with 50 TOPS AI performance, up to 17 hours of battery, a 14-inch touchscreen, MIL-STD 810H durability, and USI 2.0 stylus support.
title: Acer Swift Air 16 With Up to AMD Ryzen AI 7 CPU Launched Alongside Acer Chromebook Plus Spin 514 at IFA 2025

description: Amazon is expanding the artificial intelligence (AI)-powered Lens feature in its shopping app and introducing a new Lens Live feature. The new capability allows users to point their camera at an object and scan it in real-time using object detection and deep learning models. With this, users can see top-matched product listings within the camera view, without having to upload any images.
title: Amazon Launches AI-Powered Lens Live Feature With Ability to Scan Products, Show Real-Time Matches

description: Acer Predator Helios 18P AI (2025), Predator Orion 7000, and Orion 5000 were unveiled by the tech giant during the IFA 2025 event. The company also launched the refreshed variants of the Acer Nitro series, upgrading the processors of the laptops. The Predator Helios 18P AI will be available in the EMEA and North American markets. The company has, however, not announced when these new laptops will come to India.
title: IFA 2025: Acer Predator Helios 18P AI (2025) Launched Alongside Refreshed Orion, Nitro Series Laptops

description: India has topped the Chainalysis 2025 Global Crypto Adoption Index for the third year in a row, cementing its dominance in grassroots and institutional crypto adoption. Despite strict taxation and regulatory uncertainty, the country continues to lead global engagement, ahead of the United States and Pakistan. Experts credit India’s vast user base, strong fintech sector, and thriving Web3 developer community for this achievement, even as compliance burdens remain a challenge.
title: India Tops Global Crypto Adoption Index for Third Consecutive Year

description: Swiggy and Zomato have hiked their platform fees in anticipation of the festive rush. Swiggy now charges Rs. 15 on orders, whereas Zomato's platform fees has been hiked by Rs. 2 to Rs. 12. This price hike is said to be in anticipation of the surge in food delivery orders ahead of the festive season. Zomato is also reportedly testing a new VIP Mode which offers priority services to customers, at an extra charge.
title: Swiggy and Zomato Raise Platform Fees to Up to Rs. 15 Amidst Rise in Festival-Related Demand

description: Bitcoin is trading around $110,800 (roughly ₹97.6 lakh) and Ethereum at $4,320 (roughly ₹3.8 lakh), carried by $333 million in ETF inflows. Analysts say institutional demand and policy expectations are steadying sentiment, with traders eyeing $113,000 (roughly Rs. 99 lakh) for BTC and $4,600 (roughly Rs. 4 lakh) for ETH. Altcoins, including Solana, Dogecoin, XRP, and BNB, show selective accumulation amid cautious optimism ahead of U.S. macroeconomic data.
title: Bitcoin Holds Near 110,800 as ETF Inflows and Rate-Cut Steadies Market

description: On Wednesday afternoon, hundreds of ChatGPT users reported facing trouble accessing the OpenAI chatbot. The issue appears to have started at around 12:25pm IST and has not been resolved entirely. The global outage is said to be affecting users across the mobile apps, desktop apps, and the website.
title: ChatGPT Down: Thousands of Users Report Issues Accessing the AI Chatbot, OpenAI Responds

description: Gemini for Home, the artificial intelligence (AI) assistant for Google Home devices, is confirmed to be rolled out to users starting October 1. The initial rollout will bring the AI assistant in early access, with global rollout expected to arrive at a later time. Gemini’s integration will eliminate users’ need to use rigid commands and will allow them to make natural language requests.
title: Google Home Devices Confirmed to Get Gemini AI Integration Soon; Company Reveals Release Timeline

description: Apple is all set to launch the iPhone 17 series at its September 9 event. Prices of all four models in the purported lineup have been suggested by an analyst. iPhone 17 and iPhone 17 Pro Max are expected to start at the same price tag as last year. Meanwhile, the iPhone 17 Pro could receive a price hike, while the new iPhone 17 Air may also cost more than last year's iPhone 16 Plus.
title: iPhone 17 Pro to Get More Expensive This Year; No Price Hike for iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro Max: Report

description: Motorola Edge 50 Neo was unveiled in Europe in August 2024. The handset sports a 6.4-inch full-HD+ LTPO pOLED screen with up to 120Hz refresh rate, up to 3,000 nits of peak brightness, and a 300Hz touch sampling rate. Now, a tipster has revealed that its possible successor, the Motorola Edge 60 Neo, might arrive in the European market in a few days, while launching in India later. Although much hasn’t been revealed about the upcoming phone, the leaker has also shared a few of its specifications.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Neo Key Specifications Tipped Ahead of Imminent Launch

description: Crystal Dynamics reportedly attempted to salvage the cancelled Perfect Dark reboot by finding a new funding partner. Take-Two held talks with Microsoft to buy the game from Xbox, but talks collapsed, leading Crystal Dynamics to lay off employees and full abandon the game.
title: Take-Two Came Close to Buying Cancelled Perfect Dark Reboot From Xbox Before Talks Collapsed: Report

description: NotebookLM is now offering four new Audio Overviews formats to let users customise the AI-generated audio discussions. The four new formats are dubbed Deep Dive, Brief, Critique, and Debate. Each of these new formats features a new artificial intelligence (AI) voice, but not all of them come with two AI hosts.
title: Google NotebookLM Gets Four New Audio Overviews Formats With New AI Voices

description: Apple may unveil the iPhone 17 series, including the iPhone 17 Pro Max, on September 9. A leaked hands-on video hints at a major rear camera redesign with a raised rectangular module. The Pro Max may feature an 8x telephoto lens, a Camera Control button, an upgraded vapour cooling system, an A19 Pro chipset and wireless reverse charging support. Analyst Ming-Chi Kuo predicts the launch of a foldable iPhone in 2026 and a foldable iPad in 2028, both using ultra-thin glass.
title: iPhone 17 Pro Max Seen in Leaked Video With Redesigned Camera Module; Analyst Says Foldable iPhone to Launch in 2026

description: OnePlus 15 specifications, design, and colourways were leaked online recently. Expected to launch in China soon, the phone has now been reportedly spotted on a certification website, revealing its charging speed. Earlier leaks suggest that the handset might be powered by a soon-to-launch Snapdragon SoC with six efficiency and two performance cores. OnePlus is said to redesign the rear camera module of the phone, too.
title: OnePlus 15 Listed on a Certification Website, Likely to Support 120W Fast Charging: Report

description: The iPhone 17 series is set to debut globally on September 9, during Apple’s ‘Awe Dropping’ launch event. The upcoming lineup from the Cupertino tech giant is expected to include the standard iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and the iPhone 17 Pro Max. The company might also unveil a new slim variant, too, which could be dubbed iPhone 17 Air. Leaks regarding the specifications of the smartphones have been surfacing online. Recently, the possible colourways for handsets had also leaked online.
title: Apple iPhone 17 and iPhone 17 Pro: Expected Features, Specifications, and Price in India

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE, the company's next Fan Edition smartphone in the Galaxy S25 series of smartphones, is expected to launch at a Galaxy Unpacked event on September 4, featuring a design similar to the base S25. A new leak suggests the price range of the official cases and other accessories. It will likely have an Exynos 2400 SoC, a 4,900mAh battery, an ultrasonic in-display fingerprint sensor, and a 50-megapixel triple rear camera unit, including an 8-megapixel 3x telephoto shooter.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Accessories Leaked Ahead of Galaxy Unpacked Launch Event on September 4

description: Paramount and Activision announced a film deal for Call of Duty on Tuesday, promising an "unforgettable blockbuster" live-action feature film adaptation of the best-selling video game franchise. The two companies did not specify the valuation of the deal but said the Call of Duty movie would honour the legacy of the games.
title: Call of Duty Film Adaptation in the Works as Paramount and Activision Announce Deal

description: Apple's new Koregaon Park is set to be inaugurated tomorrow, September 4. It is the company's fourth official store in India, located in Kopa, Pune. Customers can shop for Apple products such as iPhone, iPad, and Mac. There are experience zones for various Apple services, too. Apple offers Genius Bar support and Today at Apple sessions, enabling users to get familiar with their newly purchased devices.
title: First Look: Inside Apple Koregaon Park, Pune's Brand New Apple Store

description: With the upcoming release of the iOS 26 update, compatible iPhone users are expected to get multiple new artificial intelligence (AI) features and upgrades to the existing ones. The Cupertino-based tech giant ships AI features under the Apple Intelligence umbrella. Among the new additions, users can get a new Live Translation feature for calls and FaceTime, and natural language search feature in the Messages app.
title: iOS 26 and Apple Intelligence: New AI Features Expected to Arrive Alongside the iPhone 17 Series Launch

description: The Oppo A5i Pro 5G has been launched in Malaysia at MYR 799 (roughly Rs. 16,600) with 8GB RAM and 256GB storage. It features a 6.67-inch HD+ LCD with a 120Hz refresh rate, a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset, and Android 15-based ColorOS 15.0.1. The phone has a 50-megapixel dual rear camera, an 8-megapixel front camera, a 6,000mAh battery with 45W SuperVOOC charging, and an IP65 dust and water resistance rating.
title: Oppo A5i Pro 5G Launched With 6,000mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Primary Camera: Price, Specifications

description: iOS 26 Beta 9 has been released as a free over-the-air (OTA) software update to registered Apple developers and beta testers. The update is available for iPhone 11 and later models, and carries fixes for bugs discovered in previous iterations. It is Apple's first ninth beta software update since 2018, and has been released days before the launch of the iPhone 17 series.
title: Apple Rolls Out iOS 26 Beta 9 Update for iPhone With Bug Fixes Ahead of iPhone 17 Launch

description: The Apple 'Awe Dropping' event takes place on September 9. The tech giant is expected to introduce the iPhone 17 series, Apple Watch Series 11, Apple Watch Ultra 3, Watch SE 3, and AirPods Pro (3rd Generation). Here are all the biggest leaks and rumours about the iPhone 17 series, Apple Watch Ultra 3, Watch Series 11, AirPods Pro 3, and more, ahead of Apple’s ‘Awe Dropping’ event.
title: iPhone 17 Series, New Apple Watch Models, and AirPods Pro (3rd Generation): All the Biggest Rumours and Leaks So Far

description: A consortium of Indian and US-based investors on Tuesday announced a new alliance to support and mentor deep tech startups in India. The coalition, called the India Deep Tech Investment Alliance (IDTA), brings together eight prominent equity firms from both countries with the aim of bolstering India-US deep tech collaboration.
title: India Deep Tech Investment Alliance Announced by US and Indian Equity Firms: 5 Things to Know

description: IFA Berlin 2025 is all set to begin this week. It is one of Europe’s biggest consumer electronics shows where brands are expected to showcase their latest innovations. We already have confirmation about some products that will be introduced, while rumours have also hinted towards others. From HMD Pulse 2 Pro to Lenovo Legion Go 2, here are all of the expected announcements from IFA Berlin 2025.
title: IFA 2025: From Lenovo Legion Go 2 to HMD Pulse 2 Pro, All the Expected Announcements During Tech Show
